listitem.para: ELLIPSEARC does not move the turtle. It draws part of or all of an ellipse based on the turtle heading, turtle position and given arguments. The ellipse starts at the rear of the turtle heading and sweeps by the amount of angle starting at startangle. The size is based on the minor and major values. The minor parameter is the shortest distance along the ellipse to the center point. The major parameter is the longest distance along the ellipse the center point. The center-point of the ellipse will be the turtle's current position.

programlisting.userinput: ; a 2D example ELLIPSEARC 360 100 200 0 CLEARSCREEN ELLIPSEARC 90 50 50 0 CLEARSCREEN ELLIPSEARC 90 50 50 90
